FuncDef: The display lns backup-group command displays the configuration of an LNS backup group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies all configuration of an LNS backup group.
-

Specifies the name of an LNS backup group.
The value is a string of 1 to 30 characters.

ExtraInfo: In the scenario where 1:1 inter-board backup is configured on the LNS, run the display lns backup-group command to check the configuration of an LNS backup group.
